docs.snippet: In Syria’s capital, those who remain wonder why they’re still there when so many friends have packed up, died or vanished.

headline.print_headline: Syria’s Capital Is a Lonely Place for the Ones Who Stayed Home
headline.main: They Stayed Put, but Their City Disappeared

docs.snippet: Baptist churches in the Texas towns of Daingerfield and Sutherland Springs have become sister congregations, linked by eerily similar attacks 37 years apart.

headline.print_headline: Two Texas Churches, Linked by Tragedy Between the Pews

docs.snippet: The building blocks for a classic version are salt pork (or bacon), potatoes and milk, but what about adding a bit of polenta and zucchini?

docs.snippet: The discovery of a body near the site where an indigenous rights activist vanished two months ago has raised questions about the government’s investigation.

docs.snippet: In a departure from the days when tech firms preferred old converted warehouses, they are now moving into newer high-end offices.
